author: wtopstaff
title: Wake Forest Preview Capsule
text:
By The Associated Press October 26, 2015 2:33 pm 
Wake Forest 
Last season: 13-19, no postseason. 
Nickname: Demon Deacons. Coach: Danny Manning. 
Conference: Atlantic Coast. 
Key returners: G Codi Miller-McIntyre, led team in scoring (14.7 ppg) and assists (137) but is out another 3-5 weeks with a broken foot. F Devin Thomas, had five 20-point games and ranked second in ACC with 12 double-doubles. 
Who left: High-energy forward Aaron Rountree graduated and transferred to Iona. Part-time starting guard Madison Jones was dismissed in August for violating athletic department policy. 
The Skinny: The Demon Deacons expect to show they’re making progress in Year 2 under Manning, but will that improvement translate into wins? It won’t be an easy task in an always-tough ACC. Topics:
